text:
Tough time to be a Chipotle lover.  But fear not, my friends! I've got the perfect remedy for you. 
 Introducing the "Chipotle-less Burrito Bowl Recipe" üéâ

This recipe is so close to the real deal that you won't even miss the actual Chipotle restaurant (Okay, maybe a little üò≠). The best part? You can customize it to your liking and make it as spicy or mild as you want!

Ready to dive in?

**Ingredients:**

For the chicken:
* 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into small pieces 
* 1/2 cup lime juice 
* 1/4 cup olive oil 
* 2 cloves garlic, minced 
* 1 tsp ground cumin 
* 1 tsp smoked paprika 
* Salt and pepper, to taste 

For the rice:
* 1 cup uncooked white rice 
* 2 cups water 
* 1 tbsp olive oil 
* Salt, to taste 

For the toppings:
* 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed 
* 1 can diced tomatoes, drained 
* 1 avocado, diced 
* Shredded cheese (Monterey Jack or Cheddar work great) 
* Sour cream 
* Salsa (homemade or store-bought) 
* Cilantro leaves, chopped 

**Instructions:**

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Prepare the chicken:** In a large bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, garlic, cumin, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper.
